name: ALONE (itch) (Broxly)
description:
Alone is a upgrade based adventure game. You have to improve your tools and escape from the planet. Other details such as controls are included in the game...

FINALLY

This game made in 3 days for Staretera Game Jam. Thanks to those who contributed:

Designer : Ozan İçli

Developer : Nasip Efe Tığlı

Develper & 3D Designer : Berke Aktaş
